directions: In a bowl, combine all ingredients. Place in refrigerator for up to 12 hours for flavor infusion.
ingredients: 2 seeded and minced jalapenos, plus 2 roasted, skinned and chopped jalapenos
2 dry ancho chiles, seeded, cut into short strips and snipped into pieces
Chili powder, salt, and pepper, to taste
Fresh scallions, cilantro or parsley, to taste
title: Salsa
